name: Auto Files
author: Serkan Algur

sections.description:
Auto Files is a minified version of Auto Attachments. This Plugin show you attached files in your the_content(). Supported file types are doc, docx, xls, xlsx, zip, rar, ods, ppt, odt, tar, etc…
Plugin uses own file icon font. See screenshot
sections.installation:
1. Upload auto-files folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
How i upload files to my blog or posts?

Use WordPress media uploader when you create new page or post (Insert / Upload button) and upload your files. No special things required. Plugin uses wordpress attachments.
